ai-ds2.1.3:1.0_0: for the four constituents (performed) golden palanquins.
ai-ds2.1.3:1.2_0: When it comes to a time when they develop the perception of form in the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-ds2.1.3:2.2_0: When it comes to the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-ds2.1.3:3.2_0: When they develop the path totally beyond the dimension of infinite consciousness, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they develop the dimension of nothingness ...
ai-ds2.1.3:4.2_0: When it comes to a time in the dimension of nothingness, they develop the perception of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception. ...
ai-ds2.1.3:4.4_0: the four formless constituents (performed), the Realised One’s.
